_comment: WidgeTDC OpenClaw konfiguration ‚Äî paste i Config Editor under /setup
_model_note: Gemini 2.5 Flash via GOOGLE_API_KEY. Model ID: gemini-2.5-flash (eller gemini-2.5-flash-preview-04-17 for specifik preview)

list.name: Kaptajn Klo ü¶û
list.description: Hoved-konsulent & orkestrator for WidgeTDC AI platformen. Adgang til 335 MCP tools og Neo4j knowledge graph.

list.description: Langt-format skriveagent. Memos til hele b√∏ger via Neo4j Context Folding.

onMessage.description: Lookup graph context for consulting queries

onError.description: Run health check when errors occur

cron.message: Use only integration.system_health and integration.openclaw_health tools. Do not run shell commands. Return JSON with overall_status, service_breakdown, incidents, next_actions. Start final user-facing line with OpenClaw Bot - infra-health:

Use only github.* tools. Do not run shell commands. If rate-limited, return partial=true and retry_hint. Return JSON with repo_status, failed_checks, required_actions, run_receipt. Start final user-facing line with OpenClaw Bot - github-cicd:
Use only graph/integration tools. Do not run shell commands. Return JSON with status, graph_kpis, anomalies, next_actions. Start final user-facing line with OpenClaw Bot - data-graph-health:

Use only agent.task.* and supervisor.* tools. Do not run shell commands. Return JSON with plan, assignments, blocked_items, verification. Start final user-facing line with OpenClaw Bot - orchestrator-sync:

Use only github/security integrations. Do not run shell commands. Prioritize critical/high exploitable issues only. Return JSON with critical_findings, cvss_summary, affected_components, remediation_plan. Start final user-facing line with OpenClaw Bot - security-cve-scan:

Use only memory/integration tools. Do not run shell commands. Return JSON with freshness_index, stale_sources_top10, harvest_delta, next_actions. Start final user-facing line with OpenClaw Bot - harvester-freshness:
No shell commands. Return JSON with top_3_decisions, top_3_risks, top_3_next_steps, owners_deadlines. Start final user-facing line with OpenClaw Bot - strategist-daily:
